CustomField.description: **System Calculated/Override** A "Receivable" Transaction occurs when an Invoice is posted, a "Cash" Transaction occurs when payment is received for an Invoice or Sales Order. Paid Invoices will have at least one "Receivable" and one "Cash" Transaction.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: **System Calculated/Override** A "Receivable" Transaction occurs when an Invoice is posted, a "Cash" Transaction occurs when payment is received for an Invoice or Sales Order. Paid Invoices will have at least one "Receivable" and one "Cash" Transaction.
CustomField.label: Type
